parameters.name: st
parameters.description: Two character state (e.g. 'CA') - required

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search term - note: will match district name or city (optional)

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Search for districts in this city (optional)

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: Search for districts in this 5-digit zip code (optional)

parameters.name: nearLatitude
parameters.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. 44.982560) (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only. Enterprise API level will flag districts that include lat/long in its attendance boundary.)

parameters.name: nearLongitude
parameters.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. -124.289185) (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only. Enterprise API level will flag districts that include lat/long in its attendance boundary.)

parameters.name: boundaryAddress
parameters.description: Full U.S. address: flag returned districts that include this address in its attendance boundary. Example: '123 Main St. AnyTown CA 90001' (optional) (Enterprise API level only)

parameters.name: distanceMiles
parameters.description: Search for districts within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (Default 50 miles) (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: isInBoundaryOnly
parameters.description: Return only the districts that include given location (nearLatitude/nearLongitude) or (boundaryAddress) in its attendance boundary (Enterprise API level only)

parameters.name: boxLatitudeNW
parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: boxLongitudeNW
parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: boxLatitudeSE
parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: boxLongitudeSE
parameters.description: Search for districts within a 'box' defined by (BoxLatitudeNW/BoxLongitudeNW) to (BoxLongitudeSE/BoxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1)

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of districts to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort list. Values are: districtname, distance, rank. For descending order, precede with '-' i.e. -districtname (optional, default: districtname)

parameters.name: includeUnrankedDistrictsInRankSort
parameters.description: If sortBy is 'rank', this boolean determines if districts with no rank are included in the result (optional, default: false)

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: Your API app id

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Your API app key

methods.description: Returns a detailed record for one district

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The 7 digit District ID (e.g. 0642150)

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: Your API app id

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Your API app key

methods.description: Returns a SchoolDigger district ranking list

parameters.name: st
parameters.description: Two character state (e.g. 'CA')

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The ranking year (leave blank for most recent year)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1)

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of districts to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10)

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: Your API app id

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Your API app key

methods.description: Returns a SchoolDigger school ranking list

parameters.name: st
parameters.description: Two character state (e.g. 'CA')

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: The ranking year (leave blank for most recent year)

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Level of ranking: 'Elementary', 'Middle', or 'High'

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1)

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of schools to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10)

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: Your API app id

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Your API app key

parameters.name: st
parameters.description: Two character state (e.g. 'CA') - required

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search term - note: will match school name or city (optional)

parameters.name: qSearchSchoolNameOnly
parameters.description: For parameter 'q', only search school names instead of school and city (optional)

parameters.name: districtID
parameters.description: Search for schools within this district (7 digit district id) (optional)

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Search for schools at this level. Valid values: 'Elementary', 'Middle', 'High', 'Alt', 'Public', 'Private' (optional). 'Public' returns all Elementary, Middle, High and Alternative schools

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Search for schools in this city (optional)

parameters.name: zip
parameters.description: Search for schools in this 5-digit zip code (optional)

parameters.name: isMagnet
parameters.description: True = return only magnet schools, False = return only non-magnet schools (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: isCharter
parameters.description: True = return only charter schools, False = return only non-charter schools (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: isVirtual
parameters.description: True = return only virtual schools, False = return only non-virtual schools (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: isTitleI
parameters.description: True = return only Title I schools, False = return only non-Title I schools (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: isTitleISchoolwide
parameters.description: True = return only Title I school-wide schools, False = return only non-Title I school-wide schools (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: nearLatitude
parameters.description: Search for schools within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. 44.982560) (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only. Enterprise API level will flag schools that include lat/long in its attendance boundary.)

parameters.name: nearLongitude
parameters.description: Search for schools within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (e.g. -124.289185) (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only. Enterprise API level will flag schools that include lat/long in its attendance boundary.)

parameters.name: boundaryAddress
parameters.description: Full U.S. address: flag returned schools that include this address in its attendance boundary. Example: '123 Main St. AnyTown CA 90001' (optional) (Enterprise API level only) IMPORTANT NOTE: If you have the lat/long of the address, use nearLatitude and nearLongitude instead for much faster response times

parameters.name: distanceMiles
parameters.description: Search for schools within (distanceMiles) of (nearLatitude)/(nearLongitude) (Default 5 miles) (optional) (Pro, Enterprise API levels only)

parameters.name: isInBoundaryOnly
parameters.description: Return only the schools that include given location (nearLatitude/nearLongitude) or (boundaryAddress) in its attendance boundary (Enterprise API level only)

parameters.name: boxLatitudeNW
parameters.description: Search for schools within a 'box' defined by (boxLatitudeNW/boxLongitudeNW) to (boxLongitudeSE/boxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: boxLongitudeNW
parameters.description: Search for schools within a 'box' defined by (boxLatitudeNW/boxLongitudeNW) to (boxLongitudeSE/boxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: boxLatitudeSE
parameters.description: Search for schools within a 'box' defined by (boxLatitudeNW/boxLongitudeNW) to (boxLongitudeSE/boxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: boxLongitudeSE
parameters.description: Search for schools within a 'box' defined by (boxLatitudeNW/boxLongitudeNW) to (boxLongitudeSE/boxLatitudeSE) (optional)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve (optional, default: 1)

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of schools to retrieve on a page (50 max) (optional, default: 10)

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort list. Values are: schoolname, distance, rank. For descending order, precede with '-' i.e. -schoolname (optional, default: schoolname)

parameters.name: includeUnrankedSchoolsInRankSort
parameters.description: If sortBy is 'rank', this boolean determines if schools with no rank are included in the result (optional, default: false)

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: Your API app id

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Your API app key

methods.description: Returns a detailed record for one school

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The 12 digit School ID (e.g. 064215006903)

parameters.name: appID
parameters.description: Your API app id

parameters.name: appKey
parameters.description: Your API app key

apiDescription: Get detailed data on over 120,000 schools and 18,500 districts in the U.S.
